name: restfulblogapp
description: * Clone the repo * `cd` into the directory * Make sure you've got node and npm installed * Run `npm install` to get the packages listed in package.json * Install and Run MongoDB (see https://treehouse.github.io/installation-guides/mac/mongo-mac.html) * Run `node app.js` (this might automatically open the app in a browser) * If not, open `localhost/3000` in a browser
author: bobs
